page.title: 05CHILDREN'S FAVOURITE FOODS
page.content: { {FISH AND CHIPS.}CHIPS ARE POTATOES CUT INTO SQUARE STRIPS AND YOU FRY THEM IN GREASE CALLED LARD.FISH IS COVERED WITH BATTER WHICH IS FLOUR MILK AND SALT MIXED UP. THE FISH IS DIPPED INTO IT AND THEN YOU FRY IT. {SAUSAGE BAKED BEANS AND CHIPS.}THE SAUSAGE IS LONG AND BROWN WHEN COOKED.IT IS MEAT AND BREADCRUMBS IN A SKIN.BAKED BEANS ARE HARICOT BEANS COOKED IN TOMATO SAUCE. {APPLE CRUMBLE. }IT IS MADE BY CUTTING UP SOME COOKING APPLES AND FILLING A BOWL UP TO THE EDGE. IN ANOTHER BOWL, YOU MIX BREAD CRUMBS, FLOUR AND MARGARINE WHICH MAKES A CRUMBLE.PUT THE CRUMBLE ON THE APPLES IN THE BOWL AND FLATTEN THE CRUMBLE OUT.PUT THE APPLE CRUMBLE IN THE OVEN TO COOK. THE APPLE TASTES SLIGHTLY SOUR AND THE CRUMBLE IS SWEET.
